description: Strawberry moonshine is the&nbsp;perfect drink for the summer. It’s refreshing, easy to make, and provides plenty of health benefits because it’s low in calories, sodium-free, and fat-free.
name: Salty Strawberry Moonshine

recipeInstructions.name: Pour water and sugar into a large pot. Put that on low heat and stir until the sugar is dissolved.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour water and sugar into a large pot. Put that on low heat and stir until the sugar is dissolved.

recipeInstructions.name: Remove from the heat and let it cool at room temperature.
recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the heat and let it cool at room temperature.

recipeInstructions.name: Wash and remove the stems of your strawberries.
recipeInstructions.text: Wash and remove the stems of your strawberries.

recipeInstructions.name: Dice your strawberries into small pieces and use your blender to puree them.
recipeInstructions.text: Dice your strawberries into small pieces and use your blender to puree them.

recipeInstructions.name: Add your purée and lemon juice into your mixture and stir until well combined.
recipeInstructions.text: Add your purée and lemon juice into your mixture and stir until well combined.

recipeInstructions.name: Add your Everclear into the mix and stir.
recipeInstructions.text: Add your Everclear into the mix and stir.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain your mixture into a mason jar to remove the pulp.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain your mixture into a mason jar to remove the pulp.

recipeInstructions.name: Let it sit in the refrigerator for about 2 weeks to bring back the fruity flavor.
recipeInstructions.text: Let it sit in the refrigerator for about 2 weeks to bring back the fruity flavor.
